name.description: Name for the board that you are creating. The board name can have up to 60 characters.</br>Default: `Untitled`

get.description: Retrieves a list of team members who have access to the selected board.

emails.description: Array of emails of users who you want to invite to the board. These users can be registered or non-registered.

message.description: The message which will be sent to users. This parameter is optional.

teamInvitationStrategy.description: Value can be `invite_when_required`, `off`. This parameter is optional. Value `off` will be used by default.

RAW_BODY.description: widget representation, paste json from the example to try

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of picture's parental object (must be one of ```boards```,```users```,```teams```)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of picture's parental object ([User Object](#user-object), [Board Object](#board-object) or [Team Object](#account-object))

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of picture's parental object (must be one of ```boards```,```users```,```teams```)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Identifier of picture's parental object ([User Object](ref:user-object), [Board Object](ref:board-object) or [Team Object](ref:team-object))

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of picture's parental object (must be one of ```boards```,```users```,```teams```)

parameters.description: Identifier of picture's parental object ([User Object](ref:user-object), [Board Object](ref:board-object) or [Team Object](ref:team-object))

post.summary: Step 3: Exchange authorization code with access token

parameters.name: grant_type
parameters.description: Always set the value for this parameter to `authorization_code`.

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: The Client ID of the app that is requesting for user authorization. For information on how to obtain the client ID, see [Create authorization request link](ref:create-authorization-request-link)

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: App client secret. **The client secret must be kept confidential.**

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: Paste the authorization code that was provided as the code parameter value in the redirect URI.

parameters.name: redirect_uri
parameters.description: Paste the redirect URI. The URI must match the original redirect URI that was used when requesting the authorization (including slash at the end).

get.description: Get information about an access token, such as the token type, scopes, team, user, token creation date and time, and the user who created the token.

post.description: Revoking an access token means that the access token will no longer work. When an access token is revoked, the refresh token is also revoked and no longer valid. This does not uninstall the application for the user.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: Paste the access token that you want to revoke.
